[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/guild.c

This is the standard guild inheritable. It makes a room the into a place where players can advance and do all those other wonderful guild things you would expect in a guild room.

Written by Pinkfish

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c and /std/room/inherit/guild.c
